SELECT prdt_code, prdt_name, prdt_mainimg, brand_name, updt_date, prdt_price, prdt_categori, brand_id, pl.sale_code, sl.sale_count FROM product_list pl left join sale_list sl on pl.sale_code = sl.sale_code and sale_period > now() where 0=0
and brand_id = #{brandId}::uuid
and prdt_name = #{prdtNm}::uuid
and prdt_categori like '%'||#{prdtCategori}||'%'::uuid
and updt_date > #{updtDt}
order by prdt_price desc
order by prdt_price asc

select prdt_code, prdt_name, prdt_mainimg, brand_name, updt_date, prdt_price, prdt_detailimg, prdt_categori, prdt_option, brand_id, sale_code from product_list, ( select sale_code, sale_count, sale_period from sale_list where sale_period > now() ) sl where prdt_code = #{prdtCode}::uuid and sale_code = sl.sale_code
select brand_id, brand_name, brand_detail from brand_list where brand_id = #{brandNm}
